column5: Newly remodeled apartment with a sunny, lay-back beach atmosphere. A perfect getaway for a couple to just sit back and relax. Apartment (351 sq. ft. w/private access) is separate from main house located in back, with a private balcony deck, including fully fenced yard with bbq & fire pits. Several amenities stocked, including Dish Network Cable (w/ all premium channels), blu-ray player, Roku w/ Netflix & HBOGO access, & original Nintendo system.
